content.title: Map the UI Elements
content.body:
• From the left pane of the Mapping Editor select LastName{string}.
    From the right pane of the Mapping Editor, expand TextField - tbxLastName and select text{string}.
  • From the left pane of the Mapping Editor select NickName{string}.
    From the right pane of the Mapping Editor, expand Label- TextField - tbxNickName and select text{string}.
  • From the left pane of the Mapping Editor select Phone{string}.
    From the right pane of the Mapping Editor, expand Label- TextField - tbxPhone and select text{string}.
